title: Drawing, "Design for a Monogram: B.E.", 1930–45
medium: Pen and black and blue ink, brush and black ink, blue watercolor on cream illustration board
inscribed: In graphite, lower right corner: B.E.;  upper right corner: 520.
creditline: Gift of John Finguerra in memory of his brother Jim Finguerra
description: Figure-eight shaped monogram comprised of a black "B" and blue "E", formed by two vertically arranged semi-circles surrounded on the curved edge by thin conforming lines.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Design for a Monogram: B.E.", 1930–45.
1930–45. Pen and black and blue ink, brush and black ink, blue watercolor on cream illustration board. Gift of John Finguerra in memory of his brother Jim Finguerra. 1995-164-86.
